title: Clubs
body: Does anyone knows what's wrong with the clubs? I know there's an issue with the clubs,but how long is it going to be without fix/an update from riot?

replies.body:
**I am the creator of a club for my university**; however, after that time they disabled clubs for some issue, **I cannot see the club on my client.**

Everyone else in the club can see it and have the club tag except me. It also tells them that I am offline whenever I am actually online.

It also shows them that I am still the creator of the club.

Anyone have an Idea why?
I know clubs are currently down per our [status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)page, but I don't have any updates personally beyond that.  Hang tight until everything is fixed up!
Yea,why the clubs are down for an entire week?please explain riot
The clubs being down is having an impact on team gameplay, especially for us noobs. It's been a primary place for us to come together and now no one comes online anymore. I hope they fix this soon.
